title: The Boys Season 2 Review So Far - Kinda Funny Screencast
description:
Hurry to http://upstart.com/morning to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

Go to http://hellofresh.com/80morning and use code 80morning to get a total of $80 off your first month, including free shipping on your first box!

Head to http://expressvpn.com/MORNING today and get an extra 3 months FREE on a 1 year package!

Nick, Kev, Joey, Tim, and Andy get together to discuss and recap the first 5 episodes of Amazon Original The Boys Season 2. Episode 1 The Big Ride, Ep. 2 Proper Preperation and Planning, Ep. 3 Over the Hill With the Swords of a Thousand Men, Ep. 4 Nothing Like It in the World, and Ep. 5 We Gotta Go Now.

(Episodes 1-5)

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
